name: Writopia Lab
description: Writopia Lab offers year-round, fun and productive multi-genre creative writing, essay writing, and college essay workshops online and in person, at WL labs and in schools. Reluctant and enthusiastic writers, as well as writers with learning differences, thrive at Writopia. WL student-centered, strength-based model results each year in real-world success and recognition. They utilize an honor-based, sliding scale fee structure for the afterschool and summer programs and have never turned away a
